entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I can't complete my project because of a false positive fatal error #45217
  • Allow for automatic workload installation by specifying required workloads in `global.json` #45216
  • Cross compilation on Ubuntu 22.04 to ARM from AMD #45208
  • Even if I set linux-bionic-arm64 --self-contained=true, dotnet libraries are requested when running it. #45206
  • Wrong workload versions installed when pinned to .NET 8 via `global.json` on latest GitHub Action windows runners #45204

PullRequests

Merged

  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Set outputParentDirectory for 1ES outputs #45198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix VMR Final Join stage #45205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2591265 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump darc #45186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
